casebody.data:
CHANDLER
v.
ATLANTIC SCRAP AND PROCESSING, et al. No. 35PA12-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 6, 2016. Daniel S. Walden, Winston-Salem, for Chandler, Connie. M. Duane Jones, Charlotte, for Atlantic Scrap and Processing, et al. Hatcher B. Kincheloe, Charlotte, for Atlantic Scrap And Processing, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of January 2016 by Defendant-Appellants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of January 2016."
